lead_paragraph: As Congress and President Obama argue over funds for combating the virus, donations of things like cash, condoms and mosquito repellent are being made.

headline.print_headline: Private Sector Helping Puerto Rico Fight Zika
headline.main: Private Sector Is Helping Puerto Rico Fight Zika

snippet: As Congress and President Obama argue over funds for combating the virus, donations of things like cash, condoms and mosquito repellent are being made.
abstract: Private donations are helping to stem Zika epidemic in Puerto Rico even as Pres Obama and Congress argue over how much money to allocate for fighting virus; officials stress private donations fall far short of funds needed.
